channel.title: Need help woth commands
channel.description:
i need help with commands ive made with a command maker and it saves the commands into a commands txt in my server folder. but wen i play on my server the commands dont work!!!...
can sum 1 plz help me __________________________________
by the way i am a noob and am rlly bad with all this coding for servers nd stuff....

item.title: Need help woth commands
item.dc:creator: @king_enjoi king enjoi
item.description:
@king_enjoi wrote:

try this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yanille")) { teleportToX = 2605; teleportToY = 3094; }

the port error is …that u got a runserver.bat already on…or u trying to use another port thats not 43594 …im not sure

Read full topic

item.title: Need help woth commands
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

when i compile server again it has an error:

client.java:1: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ excepted
if <command.equalsignorecase<“yanille”>>
^
1 errors
files compiled succesfully
press any key to continue . . .

yanille is the command i want to say ::yanille and tele there…

coords r: X Y
2605 3094

then it has this when i try and run it…

error: unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

Read full topic
